name: Marla Cooper
description:
have a huge heart, which wants a real and passionate love! I’m kind, open and active person and I want to find my beloved man. My dream is a big and friendly family, in which there are love, trust and respect for each other. I try to develop my mind, soul and body. I prefer to be honest and positive in relationships and I wait such from my partner.
I’m looking for a wise and virile man, who I’ll love and inspire. My ideal man must be sincere, caring and with a good sense of humor, because if you can make me laugh, you half conquered me. The most of all I appreciate in men love for life and the desire to develop. And if you’re such, we’ll be able to build strong and sincere relationship together.
